      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception

      • setup_connections

        private static void setup_connections()
                               throws SQLException
        Called to initialise the DB connection. First creates a connection to the DB using connection path, username and password. Then uses the connection to create a blank statement.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • langAvailable

        public static boolean langAvailable(String language)
                             throws SQLException
        Is called to find the language that was called in the request
        Returns:
        Boolean true/false depending if the the language matches the request
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • version

        public static String[] version()
                        throws Exception
        Is called when Client needs to update to a new version/main menu.
        Returns:
        1 dimensional String array containing the main menu elements.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • request

        public static String[][] request(String language)
                          throws SQLException
        Is called when Client makes a main menu selection. Responds with sub menu elements.
        Parameters:
        language - - The requested language as a String.
        Returns:
        2 dimensional String array containing the sub menu elements. First element references the language, the second specifies the similarity percentage.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • uses_request

        public static String[][] uses_request(String[][] menuArray)
                               throws SQLException
        Is called within the request method to add language uses to the subMenu.
        Returns:
        2 dimensional String array containing the sub menu elements with uses.
        Throws:
        SQLException
